label.popUpTitle: Dear Beneficiary, Thank for reaching out to us with your query. In order to provide you with the correct resolution, we kindly request you to provide us with your Aadhaar Number or PM KISAN ID or Phone no.
label.popUpTitleValid: We kindly request you to provide us with your valid Aadhaar Number / PM KISAN ID / Phone no.
label.popUpTitle2: Enter your last 4 digits of Aadhaar
lable.noRecordsFound: No records were found for <user_identifier>, Please enter valid Mobile/Aadhaar/Benificiary Id again.
label.popUpTitle3: Dear Beneficiary, request you to kindly enter the one time password that has been received by you.
message.invalid_question: Currently, I don't have the information you're looking for. However, I'm constantly learning and improving. Please feel free to ask me something else related to PMKISAN payment related queries, and I'll do my best to assist you.
